var cmdout = JSON.parse(inputs.stdout);

outputs.tx_status = cmdout.receipt.status; outputs.account_id = cmdout.receipt.accountId;
outputs.timestamp = cmdout.record.consensusTimestamp outputs.tx_fee = cmdout.record.transactionFee
outputs.result = "OK";
} catch (e) { outputs.result = "KO"; }
})(inputs, outputs);</value> <variable display_value="Script">71aa7f6647032200b4fad7527c9a719b</variable> </sys_variable_value> <sys_element_mapping action="delete_multiple" execute(inputs, outputs) {
var cmd = './hcli account create'
if (inputs.key) { cmd = cmd + ' --key ' + inputs.key.getValue("public_key") } if (inputs.memo) { cmd = cmd + ' --memo ' + inputs.memo } if (inputs.receiver_signature_required) { cmd = cmd + ' --reqsig' }
if (inputs.sign_with) { while (inputs.sign_with.next()) { cmd = cmd + ' --sign ' + inputs.sign_with.getValue("public_key") } }
outputs.cmd = "cd /home/servicenow/hcli && " + cmd
//outputs.cmd = "sleep 60"
})(inputs, outputs); </value> <variable display_value="Script">71aa7f6647032200b4fad7527c9a719b</variable> </sys_variable_value> <sys_variable_value action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <sys_updated_on>2022-02-04 14:58:09</sys_updated_on> <value>(function execute(inputs, outputs) {
var cmd = './hcli account create'
if (inputs.key) { cmd = cmd + ' --key ' + inputs.key.getValue("public_key") } if (inputs.memo) { cmd = cmd + ' --memo ' + inputs.memo } if (inputs.receiver_signature_required) { cmd = cmd + ' --reqsig' }
if (inputs.sign_with) { while (inputs.sign_with.next()) { cmd = cmd + ' --sign ' + inputs.sign_with.getValue("public_key") } }
outputs.cmd = "cd /home/servicenow/hcli && " + cmd

var cmdout = JSON.parse(inputs.stdout);

outputs.tx_status = cmdout.receipt.status; outputs.account_id = cmdout.receipt.accountId;
outputs.timestamp = cmdout.record.consensusTimestamp outputs.tx_fee = cmdout.record.transactionFee
outputs.result = "OK";
} catch (e) { outputs.result = "KO"; }
